required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study of Danicopan
clinical_study.official_title: A Three-Part Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Potential Drug Interaction Between ACH-0144471 and Warfarin, Bupropion, and Ethinyl Estradiol and Norethindrone (Oral Contraceptive) in Healthy Adult Subjects

collaborator.agency: Achillion, a wholly owned subsidiary of Alexion

brief_summary.textblock: This was a 3-part study (Part 1, Part 2, Part 3) with each part being an open-label, fixed sequence, 2-period study in healthy adult participants.

detailed_description.textblock: This study was conducted to assess the 2-way interaction between danicopan and warfarin (Part 1), bupropion (Part 2), and ethinyl estradiol/norethindrone (EE/NET) as an oral contraceptive (Part 3).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Part 1, Part 2, and Part 3 could be conducted concurrently or separately.

primary_outcome.measure: Part 1: Area Under The Concentration Versus Time Curve From Time 0 Extrapolated To Infinity (AUC0-inf) Of Single-dose Warfarin Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 1: Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax) Of Single-dose Warfarin Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 1: Time To Maximum Observed Concentration (Tmax) Of Single-dose Warfarin Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 2: AUC0-inf Of Single-dose Bupropion Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 2: Cmax Of Single-dose Bupropion Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 2: Tmax Of Single-dose Bupropion Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 3: AUC0-inf Of Single-dose EE/NET Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 3: Cmax Of Single-dose EE/NET Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
Part 3: Tmax Of Single-dose EE/NET Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan

secondary_outcome.measure: Part 1: International Normalized Ratio (INR) Of Single-dose Warfarin Under Multiple Doses Of Danicopan
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples will be collected for prothrombin time/INR determination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Part 1: Number Of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) After Multiple Doses Of Danicopan Coadministered With A Single Dose Of Warfarin
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (postdose) through follow-up (14 [+/- 2] days after last study drug administration)

secondary_outcome.measure: Part 2: Number Of Participants With TEAEs After Multiple Doses Of Danicopan Coadministered With A Single Dose Of Bupropion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (postdose) through follow-up (14 [+/- 2] days after last study drug administration)

secondary_outcome.measure: Part 3: Number Of Participants With TEAEs After Multiple Doses Of Danicopan Coadministered With A Single Dose Of EE/NET
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (postdose) through follow-up (14 [+/- 2] days after last study drug administration)

arm_group.description: Period 1: Participants received a single dose of warfarin. Period 2: Participants received danicopan three times daily, in addition to coadministration with a single dose of warfarin. Scheduled pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics samples were collected, with a washout period of at least 14 days between the dose of warfarin in Period 1 and the first dose of danicopan in Period 2.

Period 1: Participants received a single dose of bupropion. Period 2: Participants received danicopan three times daily, in addition to coadministration with a single dose of bupropion. Scheduled PK samples were collected, with a washout period of at least 7 days between the dose of bupropion in Period 1 and the first dose of danicopan in Period 2.

Period 1: Participants received a single dose of EE/NET. Period 2: Participants received danicopan three times daily, in addition to coadministration with a single dose of EE/NET. Scheduled PK samples were collected, with a washout period of at least 7 days between the dose of EE/NET in Period 1 and the first dose of danicopan in Period 2.

intervention.description: Danicopan was dosed as 2 x 100 milligram (mg) tablets.
Warfarin was dosed as 2 x 10 mg and 1 x 5 mg warfarin sodium tablets (Coumadin or generic equivalent).
Bupropion was dosed as Wellbutrin (or generic equivalent) as 1 x 100 mg tablet.
EE/NET (0.035 mg/1 mg) was dosed as Ortho-Novum-1/35 (or generic equivalent) fixed-dose combination tablets.

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Norethindrone acetate, ethinyl estradiol, ferrous fumarate drug combination
